Description: Customer messaging apps for sales, marketing, and support, connected on one platform.
Name: Intercom v1.0 (Deprecated)

Methods.Name: Get User by ID
Methods.Description: Gets the details of the specified user by their Intercom ID.

Methods.Name: List Users
Methods.Description: Get the details of all users in the Intercom instance.

Methods.Name: Get User by Email
Methods.Description: Gets the details of a User by their email address.

Methods.Name: Conversation Note Added
Methods.Description: Triggered when a note is added to a conversation.

Methods.Name: Company Created
Methods.Description: Triggered when a new company is created.

Methods.Name: Conversation Closed
Methods.Description: Triggered when a conversation is closed.

Methods.Name: User Tagged
Methods.Description: Triggered when a user is tagged.

Methods.Name: User Created
Methods.Description: Triggered when a new user is created in Intercom.

Methods.Name: User Untagged
Methods.Description: Triggered when a user is untagged.

Methods.Name: Conversation User Created
Methods.Description: Triggered when a user creates a conversation.

Methods.Name: Conversation User Replied
Methods.Description: Triggered when a user replies to a conversation.

Methods.Name: Get Conversation
Methods.Description: Get a full conversation.

Methods.Name: List Conversations
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all conversations.

Methods.Name: Get New Conversations
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all conversations since the last run time.

Methods.Name: Get Recently Closed Conversations By Admin ID
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all the conversations closed by an admin since the last run time.

Methods.Name: Get New Conversations By User ID
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all conversations by a users ID since the last run time.

Methods.Name: List Conversations By User Email
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all conversations by a users email.

Methods.Name: Get New Conversations By User Email
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all conversations by a users email since the last run time.

Methods.Name: List Conversations By User ID
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all conversations by a users ID.

Methods.Name: Create a Note
Methods.Description: Notes allow you to annotate and comment on your users.

Methods.Name: List New Activity Logs
Methods.Description: Get the details of admin activities logged since the last run.

Methods.Name: View Current Admin and App
Methods.Description: Get the current admin and app.

Methods.Name: Get Admin by ID
Methods.Description: Gets the details of the specified admin by their Intercom ID.

Methods.Name: List Admins
Methods.Description: Get a list of Admins.

Methods.Name: List Activity Logs
Methods.Description: Get the details of admin activities logged since the specified "Created After" date.

Methods.Name: List Contacts
Methods.Description: Get the details of all contacts in the Intercom instance.

Methods.Name: List Teams
Methods.Description: Get the details of all teams in the Intercom instance.

Methods.Name: List User Events
Methods.Description: Get the details of user events from within the past 90 days. Metadata fields should be added as custom fields with field location [events].metadata.<FieldName> (example: [events].metadata.mycustomfield).

MetaTile: Integrate Intercom | Helpdesk & Chat Automation | Cyclr
MetaDescription: Automatically send your Intercom app & chat data to your essential business applications with your own custom integrations.
Content: Create integrations between your application and Intercom that allow your users to make the most of their users' data. Use chat sessions to improve CRM and Email Marketing list data and provide more up to date and accurate services.
